author: Staff Reporter
text:
Auxilium College is organising free coaching classes for CSIR / UGC National Eligibility Test (NET) – June 2016 for candidates belonging to SC/ST, OBC and minority communities from March 12.

According to a press release, candidates with 55 per cent marks in post graduate examination, and final year PG students can apply for the coaching classes.

For UGC-NET coaching classes, the subjects offered are English and Commerce, while Mathematical Sciences, Chemical Sciences and Life Sciences will be offered for UGC/CSIR – NET.

Subjects other than these will be considered if the number of students is more than 10.

Separate classes will be held for general paper. Candidates who are interested should register their names at the college office on or before March 11 with a registration fee of Rs. 500.

For further details, contact the college office, phone number – 0416-2241774, the release said.
title: Free NET coaching classes from March 12
